name: Ellen Bruss Design
description:
EBD’s strength is creating clear communication materials of extremely high quality and creativity. Our goal is to create pieces and brands that are long lasting and memorable. Beyond our extensive knowledge of the business, we feel the talent of our design team, combined with the willingness to accommodate client needs, distinguishes us from our competition.
Our initial design process is unique as we have the creative benefit of our entire staff involved throughout the duration of the project. We do not have the hierarchy of larger agencies, enabling our entire team to share ideas and respond quickly to changes.
We have extensive experience with marketing strategy, advertising, corporate identity, marketing collateral, website and environmental design for a variety of sectors. We specialize in real estate (retail, multi-family and mixed-use) and product packaging.
